outputs.output_descr:
In 1986 the gas burst of august 21st and killed some 1750 people in the valley downstream the lake . After that some people have left their homes and moved to neighbouring areas.
Today the Nyos valley is unsafe for people to live,because of the risk of a dam breach and subsequent gas burst. People gradually come back to the valley, to grow crop and keep cattle. some are living there, despite official policies not do so. A long term and global solution should include the safe return of all people to a safer place in vicinity of their homeland and safety to the people further downstream.

in this context, the chalenge is how to facilitate the early return of some 12000 people from the camps up the hills to their home ground in the valleys. These people still live in the shelters and do only want to go back to the valley, which holds their roots and also fertile soils for their liveihood.

project_descr: The objective of the program is to safeguard the lake and rehabilitate the Lake Nyos area.
project_title: REHABILITATION SOCIO ECONOMIQUE DE L A ZONE DU LAC NYOS
